mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS user_id, u.user_name AS user_name, CASE u.user_sex WHEN 0 THEN '' WHEN 1 THEN '男' WHEN 2 THEN '女' END AS user_sex, u.user_ico_url AS user_ico_url, t.topic_id AS topic_id, t.topic_title AS topic_title, (SELECT count(reply_id) FROM reply WHERE reply.topic_id = t.topic_id) AS reply_num, date_format(t.topic_publish_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS publish_time, t.topic_content AS publish_content, f.forum_name AS forum_name, 0 AS sign, t.prop1 AS prop1, u.user_introduction AS user_introduction FROM topic AS t INNER JOIN forum AS f ON t.forum_id = f.forum_id INNER JOIN user AS u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.topic_id = #{topic_id}
